abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of the Danube River
            Enterprise Pollution Reduction Project is to reduce nutrient
            flows into bodies of water connected to the Danube River
            from selected Republic of Serbia enterprises. The extension
            is necessary to allow Serbia to use approximately US$
            840,000 in uncommitted funds, which arose in part due to an
            exchange rate buffer that implementing agency has retained.
            These funds would support additional public awareness
            raising activities and nutrient management investments in
            about six farms. These activities have high priority and are
            fully consistent with the original project objectives and
            economically justified. The mission positively appraised the
            implementing agency's action plan to implement these
            activities. This will be the second and final extension of
            the project.
